sn1.81:4.1: “Who in the world have no conflict?
sn1.81:4.4: Who always lives as their own master?
sn1.81:5.1: Who do mother, father, and brothers
sn1.81:5.3: Who here, though of low birth,
sn1.81:5.4: is bowed to even by aristocrats?”
sn1.81:6.1: “Ascetics have no conflict in the world.
sn1.81:6.2: The life of ascetics is not lost.
sn1.81:6.4: Ascetics always live as their own master.
sn1.81:7.2: bow to ascetics when they’re established.
sn1.81:7.3: Even though an ascetic is of low birth,
sn1.81:7.4: they’re bowed to even by aristocrats.”
sn1.81:10.1: The Linked Discourses on Deities are complete.
